data.event: The town on the edge of the Missouri River and was formally incorporated in 1951.

event.title: many years the town was known

data.event: For many years the town was known for its Riverside Race Track.
The site was supplanted by an automobile race track which closed in the 1990s.

event.title: A legal gambling establishment on the river now

data.event: A legal gambling establishment on the river now is the $106 million casino run by Argosy Gaming Company.
It was founded in the 1950s by Edward Young and his family.
